s_synopsis: Soviet Commander: "Who are you?" Rambo: "I'm your worst nightmare." Remember that line? Now YOU can deliver it to the enemy - in person. Thirty miles over the Afghanistan border, Soviet forces are torturing your friend and mentor, Colonel Trautman. You're the only man alive with enough guts, brawn and resourcefulness to single-handedly rescue the man who taught you how to fight. Every Soviet commando, tank and attack chopper in the sector is on your tail. It's the ultimate contest for the ultimate fighter!
